DOC.brief_title: Micronutrient-supplemented Milk Study Women Childbearing Age
DOC.detailed_description: Folic acid ( ~400 µg/day ) take around time conception significantly reduce risk neural tube defect ( NTD ) -affected pregnancy . Strategies reduce NTD folic acid , include supplement use food fortification . An attractive strategy NTD prevention use fortify food target use woman plan pregnancy . Fonterra currently market fortified-milk ( ANMUM Materna ) Asia , design use prior pregnancy . This milk product , consume directed , provide ~400 µg folic acid per day . It know whether ANMUM Materna reduce NTD rate . However , case-control study risk NTD inversely associate maternal red blood cell ( RBC ) folate concentration . Accordingly , ANMUM Materna increase RBC folate , could expect decrease NTD risk . In study , ANMUM Materna fortify milk test standard control ( unfortified ) milk 12 week period . The subject consume 75g milk powder daily throughout supplementation period .
